column2: Shameful Builder
The shameful builder can build things, just not very well.
Efficient Architect
The efficient architect can design and build impressive structures.
Master Mason
The master mason is an experienced builder, his experience allows him to build structures extremely fast and efficiently.
Royal Craftsman
Amongst the best builders in the realm, the royal craftsman builds castles for the likes of kings..
Common Soldier
This character has a rudimentary knowledge of combat skills.
Experienced Captain
This character has trained in combat and command.
Seasoned Commander
This character is an expert warrior and leader of men.
Great General
This character is a master in the art of war.
Beginner Backstabber
This character has been tutored in court politics.
Cunning Conspirator
This character is adept at manipulating others.
Political Maneuverer
This character is an illusive adversary, plotting from the shadows.
Machiavellian Manipulator
This character is a master at deceit and dishonesty.
